short_summary: Training Courses for Health and Safety Departmental Employees
description: The contract was to provide Health and Safety Training for employees in the National Capital Region (NCR) on an as and when requested basis. The contractor was required to secure training venues within the National Capital Region, maintaining a secure environment and providing all necessary equipment. The contract also required the contractor to deliver several job-specific mandatory Health and Safety Training courses to employees in the National Capital Region

full_summary:
# Health and Safety Training Tender

## Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number:** CB-921-71742800
* **Solicitation Number:** 10077587/A
* **Publication Date:** March 26, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 22, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Duration:** 3 April 2024 – 9 June 2029

## Brief Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to deliver Health and Safety Training courses specifically tailored to job requirements. The training services must be provided in both English and French and must be delivered within the National Capital Region.

## Mandatory Training Courses

*   Working at Heights
*   Trenching Awareness
*   Traffic Control in Construction Work Zones
*   Hoisting and Rigging Safety Awareness
*   Propane in Construction
*   Lift Truck Certification
*   Working at Heights - Refresher Training

## Training Requirements
The successful contractor will be responsible for arranging the necessary training venues within the National Capital Region, ensuring the provision of all necessary equipment, and maintaining a secure environment.

## Evaluation Criteria
The contractor will be evaluated based on their technical merit and price.

## Important Notice
Please note that this solicitation is now expired and is no longer accepting proposals.

## Contact Information
Stéphane Beaudry, Procurement Specialist
Phone: (613) 292-5625
Email: [Stephane.Beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Stephane.Beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
